title: The Christmas Present: An Erotic Holiday Story
description: Krista thought she was going to spend another holiday alone, until an unexpected present appeared beneath the plastic tree in her apartment, leading her on a sexual adventure. Merry Christmas took on a whole new meaning as Krista discovered how joyful having the holiday spirit could be.A light-hearted, uplifting, and playful story, this f/m short fiction contains mature subject matter (explicit sex) and is intended for an adult audience. This original short story by Victoria Primrose is 3600 words, or approximately 16 pages. First Edition. Originally published on December 06, 2012.
author: Victoria Primrose
